title: Sri Lanka test squad for upcoming tour of India announced
content:
Sri Lanka Cricket’s Selection Committee today (February 25) announced the 18-member squad taking part in the upcoming two-match test series vs India.

Accordingly, Minister of Youth and Sports, Namal Rajapaksa has given the approval for the following squad:

Dimuth Karunaratne – Captain

Pathum Nissanka

Lahiru Thirimanne

Dhananjaya de Silva – Vice-Captain

Kusal Mendis – subject to fitness 

Angelo Mathews

Dinesh Chandimal

Charith Asalanka

Niroshan Dickwella

Chamika Karunaratne

Ramesh Mendis – will not take part due to an injury

Lahiru Kumara

Suranga Lakmal

Dushmantha Chameera

Vishwa Fernando

Jeffrey Vandersay

Praveen Jayawickrema

Lasith Embuldeniya

In the meantime, Niroshan Dickwella and Dhananjaya De Silva have been drafted into the T20I squad in place of injured Kusal Mendis and Maheesh Theekshana.

Both Mendis and Theekshana suffered hamstring injuries during the 5th T20I vs Australia.

Maheesh Theekshana will return home, whilst Wanindu Hasaranga also will return home from Australia.
